scripts.pm2:start: if pm2 show jhaemin.com ; then npm run pm2:stop && npm run pm2:delete && npm run pm2:start ; else pm2 start npm --name 'jhaemin.com' -- run start ; fi
scripts.pm2:restart: if pm2 show jhaemin.com ; then pm2 restart jhaemin.com ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for jhaemin.com client' ; fi
scripts.pm2:stop: if pm2 show jhaemin.com ; then pm2 stop jhaemin.com ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for jhaemin.com client' ; fi
scripts.pm2:delete: if pm2 show jhaemin.com ; then pm2 delete jhaemin.com ; else echo 'No pm2 instance for jhaemin.com client' ; fi
scripts.pm2:reboot: rm -rf node_modules && npm install && npm run lint && next build && npm run pm2:start
